tool_description:
[ ID ]
Menampilkan data terbaru Kurs Mata Uang Indonesia (Rp) dengan mata uang SGD, USD, JPY, AUD, EUR, dan lainnya.

[ EN ]
Displays the latest data on Indonesian Currency Exchange (Rp) against SGD, USD, JPY, AUD, EUR and others.

[ SOURCE ]
https://www.bi.go.id/
name: Kurs Mata Uang
title: Kurs Mata Uang

api_list.name: Get Kurs Indonesia (Rp)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://kurs-mata-uang.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "kurs-mata-uang.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://kurs-mata-uang.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "kurs-mata-uang.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
